headline.main: Russians Stem Fierce Push At Volokolamsk and Rostov; NAZIS PUSH AHEAD ON MOSCOW FRONT

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Saturday, Nov. 22 -- After successfully delaying the launching of the Germans' sixth "major offensive" against Moscow for more than three weeks, Russian forces on the capital's western defenses, as the war draws to the close of its fifth month, are being subjected to an offensive "the like of which has not yet been seen" on the entire front, according to the Soviet military spokesman this morning.
abstract: USSR forces stem Germans at Volokolamsk and Rostov; Germans reptd gaining near Moscow; Mozhaisk situation improved for USSR; Brit tanks in action, Rostov sector; London sees serious threat, Tula area
